Dirt Events

This table has all the dirt events, with the challenge cars (linked where they are prize or special cars).
It also gives the challenge car's time for each section and the race.
Note that for quite a few races the later races are slower that the earlier ones! This may be a bit of a bug that they didnt put the cars in order of their times.
